revised_title: Discovery of a New Acid: Sulpho-naphthalic Acid
tldr: The author, M. Faraday, investigates the reaction between sulfuric acid and naphthaline, resulting in a new acid called Sulpho-naphthalic Acid. This acid has distinct properties and forms a new class of salts with different bases. The composition of the acid is determined through a rigorous analysis of its compound with baryta.
